name: Magic Carpet High Experience
description:
Born during a GameJam in a team of five friends, Magic Carpet is a retro-style game that will make you fear and loathing as in a cult movie... Among the Bosses, discover Disco Man, Gaga Ghost, Mad Doctor and many others.
Get ready to kick!

[HOW TO PLAY]
- Turn the carpet around
- Place the enemies in front of you
- Kick their butts!
- Catch the cookie for total mayhem

[FEATURES]
- 2-tap game
- Epic Bossfights
- Full of quotes from cult movies
- Original pixel-art graphics and sound design
